labstep package¶

Submodules¶

labstep.addComment module¶

labstep.addComment.addComment(user, entity, comment)¶

Add a comment to a labstep entity such as an experiment or resource :param user: The labstep user to comment as. Must have property ‘api_key’. See ‘login’. :type user: obj :param entity: The labstep entity to comment on. Must have ‘thread’ property with property ‘id’. :type entity: obj :param comment: The body of the comment :type comment: str

Returns

An object representing a comment on labstep.

Return type

comment

labstep.attachFile module¶

labstep.attachFile.attachFile(user, entity, filepath, caption)¶

Attach a file to a labstep entity such as an experiment or resource. Optionally include a cpation describing the file. :param user: The labstep user to attach as. Must have property ‘api_key’. See ‘login’. :type user: obj :param entity: The labstep entity to attach to. Must have ‘thread’ property with property ‘id’. :type entity: obj :param filepath: The filepath to the file to attach :type filepath: str :param caption: An optional caption for the file. :type caption: str

Returns

An object representing a comment on labstep.

Return type

comment

labstep.attachProtocol module¶

labstep.attachProtocol.attachProtocol(user, experiment, protocol)¶

Attach a Labstep Protocol to a Labstep Experiment :param experiment: The labstep experiment to attach the protocol to. Must have property ‘id’. :type experiment: obj :param protocol: The labstep protocol to attach. Must have property ‘id’.

Returns

An object representing the updated labstep experiment.

Return type

experiment

labstep.createExperiment module¶

labstep.createExperiment.createExperiment(user, name, description)¶

Create a new Labstep Experiment :param user: The Labstep user creating the experiment. Must have property ‘api_key’. See ‘login’. :type user: obj :param name: Give your experiment a name. :type name: str :param description: Give your experiment a description.

Returns

An object representing the new labstep experiment.

Return type

experiment

labstep.createProject module¶

labstep.createProject.createProject(user, name)¶

Create a new Labstep Project :param user: The Labstep user creating the project. Must have property ‘api_key’. See ‘login’. :type user: obj :param name: Give your project a name. :type name: str

Returns

An object representing the new Labstep project.

Return type

project

labstep.createProtocol.createProtocol(user, name)¶

Returns

Return type

labstep.createResource module¶

labstep.createResource.createResource(user, name)¶

Returns

Return type

labstep.getExperiment module¶

labstep.getExperiment.getExperiment(user, id)¶

Retrieve a specific Labstep Experiment.

Parameters

  • user (obj) – The Labstep user. Must have property ‘api_key’. See ‘login’.

  • id (int) – The id of the Experiment to retrieve.

Returns

An object representing a Labstep Experiment.

Return type

experiment

labstep.getExperiments module¶

labstep.getExperiments.getExperiments(user, count=100)¶

Retrieve a list of a users Experiments on Labstep.

Parameters

  • user (obj) – The Labstep user whose Experiments you want to retrieve. Must have property ‘api_key’. See ‘login’.

  • count (int) – The number of Experiments to retrieve.

Returns

A list of experiment objects.

Return type

experiment

labstep.login module¶

labstep.login.login(username, password)¶

Returns an authenticated labstep User object to allow you to interact with the labstep API.

Parameters

  • username (str) – You labstep username

  • password (obj) – Your labstep password

Returns

An object representing a user on labstep.

Return type

user
